Name: Overgrowth Surge
Story Background: Deep within the ancient forest, the magical energy of nature surges forth to defend its own.
Ability: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. If that creature is a Treefolk, it also gains trample until end of turn.
Appearance Description: The card art shows vibrant green energy swirling around a massive tree creature, imbuing it with strength and power. Leaves and branches twist and grow, emphasizing the connection between nature and magic.
